title: U.S. Job Market Cools Off: Will the Fed Loosen Its Grip on Inflation?
description: The US job market in October has signaled a deceleration, sparking discourse on whether this could imply a softening in the Federal Reserve’s aggressive stance against inflation. Charles-Henry Monchau, Chief Investment Officer (CIO) of Syz Group, drew attention to this shift in a LinkedIn post dated 3 November 2023. Bank SYZ SA emerged with an […]

title: DOJ Announces Plan To Control $54,000,000 in Crypto Allegedly Obtained in Illegal Narcotics Scheme
description:
The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) is announcing a plan to seize millions of dollars worth of crypto that was allegedly gained from the sales of illegal narcotics. In a new press release, the DOJ says it has filed a forfeiture action against $54 million in crypto assets that can be traced to an illegal […]

The post DOJ Announces Plan To Control $54,000,000 in Crypto Allegedly Obtained in Illegal Narcotics Scheme appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
